trans-unit.note: This isn't used by code, but rather we harvest some of these for use in making the GIF that shows when the software is installing.
In English, given the context, just "Installing..." is enough. But your translation can be verbose, like "Software Installation in Progress...".

trans-unit.source: The image file {0} is corrupt and needs to be replaced. ({1})
trans-unit.note: The placeholder {0} represents the name of the corrupt file. The placeholder {0} represents a message describing the problem with the file.

trans-unit.source: Bloom could not reach the server to get the list of bookshelves.

trans-unit.note: After this text, the program will display the path to the conversion file (the location of the file on this computer). The conversion file specificies a mapping which is used to convert the script for one language into the script for another.
This text is shown if an error occurred while running eSpeak. eSpeak is a piece of software that this program uses to do text-to-speech (have the computer read text out loud).

After this text, the program will display the language code of the language settings that eSpeak used. eSpeak is a piece of software that this program uses to do text-to-speech (have the computer read text out loud).
After this text, the program will display the text of the current text box after being converted into the script of another language using the settings in the conversion file.

trans-unit.source: Bloom was unable to start its own HTTP listener that it uses to talk to its embedded Web browser. If this happens even if you just restarted your computer, then ask someone to investigate if you have an aggressive firewall product installed, which may need to be uninstalled before you can use Bloom.
It looks like you are trying to open a Bloom Collection from inside of a ZIP file. You need to first unzip the ZIP file, and then open the collection.

trans-unit.note: Title of the Link Target chooser dialog that lets users pick where a link should go.
Heading above the list of books in the Link Target chooser dialog.
Heading above the list of pages for the currently selected book in the Link Target chooser dialog.
Shown in the Link Target chooser when the stored link points to a book that is no longer available. {0} is the missing book ID.
Shown in the Link Target chooser when the stored link points to a page that no longer exists. {0} is the missing page ID and {1} is the book title.

trans-unit.source: Select a book to see its pages
trans-unit.note: Message in the Link Target chooser telling the user to pick a book before pages can be shown.
Status text shown in the Link Target chooser while the page list is loading.
Error message shown in the Link Target chooser if the page list cannot be retrieved.
Label for the URL section in the Link Target chooser dialog.

trans-unit.source: The URL can be a website or one generated by selecting a book and/or page above
trans-unit.note: Tooltip for the information icon next to the URL label in the Link Target chooser dialog.
Placeholder text inside the URL text box in the Link Target chooser dialog.
Text announced for the button that opens additional link options in the Link Target chooser dialog.
Tooltip for the Back menu item within the Link Target chooser options menu.
Label of the Back menu item in the Link Target chooser options menu.
Tooltip for the button that pastes a URL from the clipboard in the Link Target chooser dialog.
Tooltip for the button that opens the entered URL in the system browser from the Link Target chooser dialog.
The title of the color picker dialog shown to choose the color of the bulk BloomPUB bookshelf.

trans-unit.source: Currently, Bloom does not support including audio from embedded videos in video output.

Bloom needs to verify your email, but our attempt to resend the request failed, possibly because you made too many requests too close together. Please check your email, and if you can't find the message, try again later.
The collection's bookshelf was not on the list of bookshelves for this Bloom subscription.
This collection is in "Download for Edit" mode. The book has the same subscription setting as when it was last uploaded.
To help cover a portion of the costs associated with providing Bloom, we offer [advanced features](%0) and customizations as a subscription service.
trans-unit.note: %0 will be replaced with a URL for more information about advanced features

trans-unit.source: Please contact [%0](%1) to purchase your subscription code.
trans-unit.note: %0 will be replaced with an email address, %1 with a mailto link to that address

trans-unit.source: If your project is fully funded and managed by your local language community, you may qualify for a free [Bloom Community Subscription](https://bloomlibrary.org/subscriptions).
The code should look like SOMENAME-123456-7890
That code appears to be incorrect.
This version of Bloom does not have the artwork that goes with that subscription.

trans-unit.note: Available for users with the lowest level of subscription.
This is the highest level of subscription, serving projects that need publisher and sponsor logos, teams, etc.
Available for projects that do not receive external funding.
"Pro" is short for "Professional" in English. This is a subscription tier.
This is not one of the tiers, just a label
This is the name of a feature in BLoom
This is the name of a feature in BLoom

trans-unit.source: Export warning: Found differing 'src' attribute and element text for data-div element {0}. The 'src' attribute will be ignored.
Export warning: Found multiple elements for image element {0}. Only the first will be exported.

trans-unit.note: {0} is a placeholder for an exception message

trans-unit.source: Bloom could not write to the spreadsheet because another program has it locked. Do you have it open in another program?
Export warning: did not find the image {0}. It will be missing from the export folder.
Export warning: Found multiple images in data-book element {0}. Only the first will be exported.
You are about to replace the existing folder named {0}
The folder named {0} already exists and looks like it might be a Bloom book folder!
Bloom had trouble copying the file {0} to the video folder: {1}
trans-unit.note: {1} is a more detailed, usually technical, error message and should be at the end if possible.

trans-unit.source: Bloom had trouble copying the folder {0} to the activities folder: {1}
trans-unit.note: {1} is a more detailed, usually technical, error message and should be at the end if possible.

trans-unit.source: Bloom had problems writing files to that location ({0}). Check that you have permission to write there.
Bloom cannot export because {0} pages contain drag-and-drop games.
trans-unit.note: {0} is a placeholder for the number of pages

trans-unit.source: Put the correct answer in this button. Bloom will randomize the order later.
Please also send us the latest log file found at {0}.
trans-unit.note: {0} will be replaced with the location on the user's computer of the Bloom log file (usually Log.txt).

trans-unit.source: Bloom was not able to access a microphone.

trans-unit.note: The title of a dialog telling the user about a problem with their Microsoft OneDrive.

trans-unit.source: There is a problem with your Microsoft OneDrive which is preventing Bloom from accessing files.
Bloom made a mistake on this page. Please report this to us, then check that nothing was lost.
Please enter one or more valid administrator email addresses, separated by commas or spaces.

trans-unit.note: %0 is a placeholder for the current url where the hyperlink points
{0} will be replaced with the name of the collection that the user currently has open for editing.
Title of the dialog for setting up a grid of book links
Title of the dialog for setting up a TOC grid for the current book
Header for the list of books available in the current collection
Button to add the selected book to the grid of links
Button to add all available books to the grid of links
Header for the list of books that have been added to the grid, %0 is the count
Button text to add one more link tile in TOC grid setup
